entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is described as cool, tall, and wearing an earring with a fang dangling from it. He has long hair tied back in a ponytail.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry recognizes Bill's boots to be made of dragon hide.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley appears out of thin air and is described as looking angrier than Harry has ever seen him.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is accused by Mr. Weasley of giving something to a Muggle boy.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley accuses Fred of giving something to a Muggle boy.
Harry recognizes Bill's boots to be made of dragon hide.
